meanings.definition: The bed on which a person dies.
meanings.sent1: She peacefully passed away on her deathbed.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered around the deathbed to say their goodbyes.
meanings.sent3: The cat curled up on the deathbed, purring softly.
meanings.sent4: The old rocking chair served as a deathbed for the worn-out doll.
meanings.sent5: The white sheets on the deathbed seemed to glow in the dim room.

meanings.definition: The final moments or period of a person's life.
meanings.sent1: In his deathbed, he reflected on his life's journey.
meanings.sent2: The doctor knew the patient was in the deathbed stage.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about his imaginary deathbed bucket list.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the essence of mortality in his deathbed painting.
meanings.sent5: The sun setting on the horizon symbolized the approaching deathbed of the day.
